intent_atoms.description: Run the lenient-versus-strict benchmark on macOS hardware with Combine enabled using a 1 GiB fixture and archive performance metrics.

Export ISOINSPECTOR_BENCHMARK_PAYLOAD_BYTES=1073741824, invoke swift test with specified filter, archive runtime and RSS metrics under Documentation/Performance/, cross-check against Linux baseline log, and note deviations in summary log.
The archived macOS benchmark results must be stored alongside existing 32 MiB results in Documentation/Performance/.
Extend CLI output to show corruption summary metrics using Task T6.2 implementation, depending on Task T2.3 metrics aggregation functions ParseIssueStore.metricsSnapshot() and makeIssueSummary().

functional_units.name: Lenient vs Strict Benchmark Execution
functional_units.description: Run the lenient-versus-strict benchmark on macOS hardware with Combine enabled using a 1 GiB fixture and capture runtime and RSS metrics.

functional_units.name: Benchmark Results Archival
functional_units.description: Archive printed runtime and RSS metrics under Documentation/Performance alongside existing 32 MiB results.

functional_units.name: Cross-Check Benchmark Results
functional_units.description: Compare macOS benchmark results against archived Linux baseline and note deviations in the summary log.

functional_units.name: CLI Corruption Summary Output Extension
functional_units.description: Extend CLI output to show corruption summary metrics, including strict success, lenient without issues, and lenient with mixed‑severity issues.

functional_units.name: Metrics Aggregation Dependency
functional_units.description: Use Task T2.3 metrics aggregation via ParseIssueStore.metricsSnapshot() / makeIssueSummary() for CLI corruption summary.
